title-group.article-title: Iterative and Semi-Iterative Methods for Computing Stationary Probability Vectors of Markov Operators

abstract.p: Iterative and semi-iterative methods for computing stationary probability vectors of Markov-type operators are proposed and their convergence properties are analyzed. The methods studied apply to certain classes of problems in infinite-dimensional spaces as well as to classical n × n stochastic matrices.
